data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 293,025 lost in Jalapa that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jalapa, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, 390,500 people live in the state of Jalapa. Please, give them 78 new simple churches this year.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Jalapa, Guatemala. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Jalapa, Guatemala to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
the state of Jalapa has (about) 97,475 people who know Jesus, 274,689 people who know about him culturally, and 18,336 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Jalapa, Guatemala.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Jalapa with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
